root: ^“That should at least keep us going for a while.”

^“The sail materials can’t be replaced with anything easily mined on this planet. Fortunately, it looks like there’s some kind of high-energy fossil fuel here that might cover our power needs for now.”
^“Garbage Collection and Recycling Robot Taco, at your service.”
^“I’ve sent the new—uh, ‘cleanup’ target to your terminal.”
